name: Video Classification
description: Categorize video clips into different classes based on their content, helping to identify various activities or scenes.
usecase: Used in action recognition, video recommendation systems, and video content analysis.
challenges: Challenges include temporal modeling, handling long sequences, and limited training data.
popular_methods: Common methods include 3D convolutional neural networks (3D CNNs), recurrent neural networks (RNNs), and attention mechanisms.
